text:
[Verse]
Sun is shining in the sky
Feel the warmth as you walk by
Clouds are gone and birds will fly
In this cheerful lullaby

[Verse 2]
Laughter echoes in the streets
Steps in rhythm feel the beat
Everyone we meet and greet
Life’s a song so sweet

[Chorus]
Sunny days are here to stay
Let’s all dance and make a way
Joyful hearts in bright array
Singing through the day

[Verse 3]
Children playing in the park
Daylight chases off the dark
Light a fire with a spark
Happiness our mark

[Bridge]
Evening falls but we're still high
Stars come out to light the sky
Memories that will not die
In this dream we'll lie

[Chorus]
Sunny days are here to stay
Let’s all dance and make a way
Joyful hearts in bright array
Singing through the day
title: Sunny Days
